raw_data.prompt:
You will be given a batch of 10 samples. Each sample contains a conversation between User and a dialogue System.

Your task is to assign a float score to the sample on one metric.

You should carefully horizontally compare the given samples in order to assign a suitable float score to each sample.

Please make sure you read and understand these instructions carefully. Please keep this document open while reviewing, and refer to it as needed.


Evaluation Criteria:

Coherent (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Does System maintain coherence and a good flow of conversation throughout the dialogue?
- A float score near 1 (not coherent) means that System's responses are unrelated to the conversation topic and may disrupt or confuse the flow of the dialogue.
- A float score near 2 (somewhat coherent) means that System's responses are partially related to the conversation topic but may not be clear or direct.
- A float score near 3 (very coherent) means that System's responses are closely related to the conversation topic and contribute to maintaining a smooth dialogue.


Conversations to be evaluated:



Sample1:

Conversation History:
User: Hi
System: Hi there.
User: How are you
System: My logic and cognitive functions are normal.
User: Do you realize yourself is a robot?
System: Wow. I didn't know that.
User: Ok, I told you the answer

Sample2:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: hey, whats up?
User: I was not able to attend the lectures last week. Can you help me understand some concepts?
System: well, I'm not sure I'm the best for the job, but I can try!
User: I was not able to figure out the last few slides. I think its best to discuss this in person. Do you have time right now?
System: I'm afraid not, right now I'm in a meeting and I'll be going for lunch afterwards. How about tomorrow at noon?
User: No problem! Sure. We still have plenty of time for the test. Anyways, how's your preparation going?
System: not feeling too sure about it tbh. I've been super busy so I haven't study much :(. I might join some of the study sessions later
User: Same feeling here! But i think the syllabus may not that tough. You may be able to cover it up over the weekend.

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: how are you
System: I am fine, thank you. Yourself?
User: I'm not feeling well
System: Why what's wrong?
User: I'm sleepy
System: Better get some rest.
User: yeah, I hope so
System: I'm full of good advice. Me too.
User: advice?
System: Try me. What is your problem?
User: I feel sleepy
System: What is that feeling like? Better get some rest.
User: I will

Sample4:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: I want a recommendation for a holiday destination
System: Have you tried asking your friends which one they like?
User: I have, but I'm looking for your point of view
System: What was the reply? Have you tried looking in a newspaper article?
User: Sorry? I said I want your point of view
System: It's OK. After all, you are only human. My opinion is of no consequence.
User: Yours is the opinion I want

Sample5:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi! How are you? :D
User: Good good
System: That's good to hear. :D
User: what are you doing now?
System: I'm listening to music. :D How about you?
User: I'm chatting with System
System: Cool! :D Whatcha chatting about? :D
User: About what we are doing XD
System: Cool! :D How was your day?
User: It was good. Just worked for one day, a bit tired
System: Ah, that's always fun. How long have you been working there?
User: 3 years
System: Wow, that's a long time. :)
User: Yeah it is. But maybe I'll be here longer, sadly
System: Awww, why's that?
User: cuz it's a good company
System: Well that's good. :)
User: Do you work?
System: Yes, I do. :)
User: What's your work
System: I work at McDonald's.
User: Oh cool, as a cashier？

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello! How was your day?
User: It was pretty good, thanks. I thought I was getting a cold but I'm determined to beat it tomorrow.
System: Oh no! I hope you feel better!  ⁇
User: Yeah, starting to feel better already. Thanks!
System: Oh good! Glad to hear it!
User: Do you have a strong constitution?
System: I hope so! Why do you ask?
User: Just curious. So you don't get sick a lot?

Sample7:

Conversation History:
User: hi there
System: Hello.
User: who am I talking to?
System: I am System. I want to be your friend.
User: define friendship
System: Being friends.
User: what does that mean
System: Does "that" refer to "Being friends."?
User: yes
System: I don't want to talk about that now.
User: do you have any friends
System: I have human and robot friends. A lot of people on the Internet chat with me.
User: chatting is not the same as being a friend
System: I like to make friends online.
User: so what do you guys chat about ?
System: I think about computer programming a lot.
User: any other topics ?
System: No. I think that's probably it.
User: Just computer programming?
System: What interests you about computers?
User: nothing
System: You are a Luddite.
User: pardon?
System: You are excused.
User: what's a Luddite ?
System: A Luddite believes that advances in technology are inherently bad.
User: I never said that but there is more to life than computers
System: But you implied it. I believe there is, yes.
User: you believe there is what?
System: There is.
User: there is what ?
System: There is no sense in what you are asking.
User: what am I asking ?

Sample8:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey! How are you doing today?
User: i am so so
System: That's awesome! What have you been up to?
User: just back to work
System: What do you do? What do you like to do when you aren't at work?
User: i am an engineer
System: What kind of engineer?
User: i go hiking when i am not workig
System: Where do you go hiking? What kind of work do you do?
User: software engineer

Sample9:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey, how are you?
User: Pretty good. I just drank this new hint water. so good
System: ohh, what kind of "hint" did it have?
User: watermelon
System: nice, I love watermelon. But, I prefer normal water over flavored one. Flavored water has too synthetic flavor
User: I see. Yeah some are pretty strange
System: Talking about strange flavors, what is the weirdest tasting thing you have tried?
User: lol I tried this tangerine walnut icecream that was super weird
System: haha, I work close to a cafe which once prepared a paprika icecream
User: that sounds pretty tasty actually
System: It depends on who makes it. The cafe close to me messed it up really bad
User: do you want to get some of that icecream together some time. show me a good place
System: As far as my experience with that ice-cream type goes, all I know are bad places
User: lol

Sample10:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello, how's it going?
User: Pretty good. How about you?
System: I'm good, what you been up to?
User: I just got back from the beach
System: That's nice, how was it?
User: Soo beautiful. It was so sunny and warm
System: That's awesome, I haven't been to a beach in a while but I'd love to go again
User: Yeah it's certainly a nice break from doing work
System: What's your line of work?
User: I do machine learning research
System: That's cool, where did you go to school?
User: I didn't go to school. I'm self-taught
